description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Be the star of the show, with your own music, in Avatar Superstar! Use your headset microphone or Kinect to sing to your own favorite songs, and see how you measure up to your favorite artists. Sound like a real pro with “SuperTune”  automatic tuning technology. Are you the next Avatar Superstar?
